common: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `additional_materials` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `am_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `measure` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `cost` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `am_category_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `cost_euro` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `additional_services` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `as_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `mesuare` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `cost` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `am_categories` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `am_category_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `am_orders` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `order_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `am_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `quantity` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `sum` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `as_orders` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `order_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `as_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `quantity` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `sum` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `component_price` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `c_code` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `component_en` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `component_ru` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `mill_finish` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `white` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `dark_oak` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `anod_inox` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `anod_silver` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `unit` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `price` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `constructions` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `order_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `con_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `flap_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `width` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `height` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `currency_exchange` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `actual_date` date DEFAULT NULL,   `eur_rur` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `customers` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `phone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `passport` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `passport_out` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `passport_date` date DEFAULT NULL,   `attorney_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `attorney_doc` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `customer_bank` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `is_dealer` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,   `customer_inn` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `documents` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `order_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `doc_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   `doc_date` date DEFAULT NULL,   `link` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `glass_price` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `height_meters` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `thick_6` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `thick_8` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `thick_10` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `glass_price_dealer` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `height_meters` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `thick_6` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `thick_8` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `thick_10` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `users` ( `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `login` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `access_type` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`Id`), UNIQUE KEY `login` (`login`), KEY `password` (`password`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `orders` (   `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,   `order_date` date DEFAULT NULL,   `customer_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',   `width` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `square` decimal(12,6) DEFAULT NULL,   `glass_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `fix_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `mov_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `glass_thick` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `cost` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `discount` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `cost_w_discount` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `install_cost` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `total_cost` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `constructions_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `contract_num` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL,   `am_cost` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `am_discount` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   `am_cost_w_discount` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `am_install_cost` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `am_total_cost` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `as_total_cost` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `order_total_cost` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `m_for_contract` decimal( 12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `vat_m_for_contract` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `w_for_contract` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `vat_w_for_contract` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `customer_notes` blob,   `system_type` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',   `is_no_install` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,   `is_no_am_install` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,   `ce_on_calc_day` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL,   `user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `order_history` (`Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`order_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',`user_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',`date` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00',`operation` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',PRIMARY KEY (`Id`),KEY `order_id` (`order_id`),KEY `user_id` (`user_id`),CONSTRAINT `order_history_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`order_id`) REFERENCES `orders` (`Id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,CONSTRAINT `order_history_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`Id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
